Grammar:    DataElement 5.0
Namespace:  shr.test
Uses:       shr.core

CodeSystem:     FOO = http://foo.org

EntryElement:   IncludesCodeConstraintOnValue
Description:    "It is an entry with an includes code constraint on the value"
Value:          Coding
                Coding += FOO#bar "FooBar"

EntryElement:   IncludesCodeConstraintOnValueChild
Description:    "It is an entry with an includes code constraint on the value's child"
Value:          MultiCodedFromValueSet
                MultiCodedFromValueSet.Coding += FOO#bar "FooBar"

EntryElement:   IncludesCodeConstraintOnField
Description:    "It is a group entry with an includes code constraint on a field"
Property:       Simple 0..1
Property:       Coding 1..*
                Coding += FOO#bar "FooBar"

EntryElement:   IncludesCodeConstraintOnFieldChild
Description:    "It is a group entry with an includes code constraint on a field's child"
Property:       Simple 0..1
Property:       MultiCoded0..1            MultiCodedFromValueSet
                MultiCodedFromValueSet.Coding includes FOO#bar "FooBar"

Element:        Simple
Value:          string

Element:        MultiCodedFromValueSet
Value:          1..* Coding from http://standardhealthrecord.org/test/vs/Coded (required)
